SEARCH

Package DBLayer

package DBLayer
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminDAO
    The AdminDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the database related to administrator operations.
    CategoryDAO
    The CategoryDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the database related to category operations.
    DatabaseConnection
    The DatabaseConnection class provides a utility for establishing a connection to a MySQL database.
    OrderDAO
    The OrderDAO class provides data access methods for handling orders and related operations in the database.
    ProductDAO
    The ProductDAO class provides data access methods for handling products and related operations in the database.
    UserDAO
    The UserDAO class provides data access methods for user-related operations in the database.
